task.title: How to drive home
task.shortdesc: The steps below will outline how Marjan will pack her car and prepare for her trip home.

taskbody.context: The drive to Northern Virginia from Blacksburg is 4 hours long so Marjan must prepare for her dpearture my packing her car and preparing for the drive.

step.cmd: Pack suitcases and belongings into trunk of car
Inspect outside of car (tire pressure, mirrors, etc.)
Get in driver's seat and put on seat belt
Enter home address into Google Maps and click "GO"
Follow navigation until destination is reached
